mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(m.perms) FROM sys_menu m, sys_role_menu rm, sys_user_role r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND rm.role_id = r.role_id AND m.menu_id = rm.menu_id AND m.perms != ''
SELECT DISTINCT (r.role_key) FROM sys_role r, sys_user_role ur WHERE r.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
